# Core Rule 4 - Erotic Roleplay (ERP) is allowed in moderation but should not be the focus of the round
Erotic Roleplay (commonly abbreviated as "ERP") and sexual content is permitted [bold]in moderation[/bold]. This includes direct and indirect mentions of sexual behavior or actions.
In-game romantic relationships [italic]between characters[/italic] is permitted.
Clear and unambiguous consent is required from both parties.
Acts of a non-consensual nature are not allowed even if both players consent.
## Examples Allowed: - Suggestive talk, flirting, actions of public affection (kissing, cuddling, etc.) - Mention of sexual acts, as long as it is clear that it is in character. - Brief actions of a light sexual nature, such as fondling, with consent.
Prohibited: - Full focus Erotic Roleplay, with lengthy chat actions. - Abandoning a role in order to focus on Erotic Roleplay. - Dedicating significant portions of rounds to Erotic Roleplay. - Emoting defecation, urination, vomit or related acts. - In-character non-consensual actions, even if both players consent. (e.g. rape, non-consensual sex, etc.)
First offenses will result in a warning. Repeated offenses will result in a ban.
